value.title: Raisin, Deposit Solutions To Create Pan-European FinTech In Merger
value.excerpt: Two large German FinTechs, Raisin and Deposit Solutions, will be merging into a new pan-European group, a Financial Times (FT) report says. The combined company is to be called Raisin DS. It will be headquartered in Berlin and will have around 400 banking partners as well as over 500 employees.
